titles.title: To extend the statute of limitations applicable to civil actions brought by the Federal conservator or receiver of a failed depository institution.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E126)
Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act and the Federal Credit Union Act to extend from three to five years the statute of limitations for civil actions brought by a Federal conservator or receiver of a failed depository institution.
